page.title: 19Newtown Market
page.content: Our class visited the local market and interviewed 25 shoppers. 56% of the people travelled less than 1 mile to shop,18% travelled between 1 and 5 miles and 26% travelled over 10 miles. Most of the interviewees thought that the prices were reasonable.74% of the people visited the market weekly,26% visited occasionally.People found the fruit and vegetables to be of reasonable quality.Other stalls sell clothes,jewellery,shoes,crafts,fancy dress,children's clothes and material. 0% considerd Newtown Market to be poor 45% thought it good,40% said very good and 15% thought the Market was exellent.The majority of people spent between Â£0 and Â£10 at the Market.6 out of 25 people bought fish and meat at the Market.
